titles.title: Reserve and Guard GI Bill Housing Fairness Act

To amend title 38, United States Code, to clarify when educational assistance is available for an individual who pursues an approved program of education leading to a degree while on active duty in the Armed Forces.
Reserve and Guard GI Bill Housing Fairness Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic Opportunity.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

bill.summary:
Reserve and Guard GI Bill Housing Fairness Act
This bill specifies that Department of Veterans Affairs educational assistance is payable for programs of education leading to a degree that is pursued on active duty if the active duty is for a period of more than 30 days.
